message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. I believe it's worth discussing a price that suits both parties. I'm willing to start with a price of $1000000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I have to consider the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to the value it holds for me. I'm counteroffering at $1050000.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I still think $950000 is a fair price considering the value I see in the product. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand you're trying to find a sweet spot, but I'm still not comfortable going below $1050000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to get closer to the value it holds for me. I'm counteroffering at $1020000.
I appreciate your concession, but I still think we can meet in the middle. I'm willing to go up to $990000, but I don't think I can go any higher than that. Can we meet at $990000?

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to the value it holds for me. I'm counteroffering at $1010000. I'm not sure if I can go any lower than this.

I understand you're trying to get closer to your target price, but I'm still not willing to go above $980000. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to stay within my budget. Can we meet at $980000?

I appreciate your willingness to make a final concession, but I'm starting to feel that we're getting close to the lower end of my acceptable range. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $980000 and my target price, which is $1050000. I'm counteroffering at $1015000. This is my final concession, and I hope we can meet at this price.

I understand that you've made a significant concession, but I'm still not willing to go above $975000. I'm willing to make one last attempt to reach a deal, but I need to stay within my budget. Can we meet at $975000?
